articles.title: Sources: Jags get Newsome; Campbell to Browns
articles.summary: The Jaguars and Browns agreed to a trade of cornerbacks Wednesday night, with Greg Newsome heading to Jacksonville and Tyson Campbell going to Cleveland, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

articles.title: Perception of Mayfield shifting amid MVP-type run
articles.summary: Baker Mayfield has seen the perception himself change dramatically from the time he was a first overall draft pick with the Browns to being what some have described as an MVP candidate in his third year with the Buccaneers.

articles.title: Bengals to start Flacco at QB against Packers
articles.summary: The Bengals will start newly acquired quarterback Joe Flacco this Sunday against the Packers, coach Zac Taylor announced Wednesday.

articles.title: 'Fail Mary' backlash still hurts Bears' Stevenson
articles.summary: Bears cornerback Tyrique Stevenson says the backlash he received for his role in tipping a Hail Mary pass against the Commanders last season "still hurts."

articles.title: 49ers' Purdy still not practicing; IR move not likely
articles.summary: Brock Purdy still isn't practicing due to a toe injury that has forced him to miss three games, but the 49ers aren't ready to consider putting him on injured reserve.

articles.title: Bateman: 1-4 Ravens 'deserve all the criticism'
articles.summary: Rashod Bateman acknowledged Wednesday that "it's kind of shocking" to himself and the rest of the organization that the Baltimore Ravens are off to a 1-4 start.

articles.title: Cards' Harrison: 'Special' facing dad's team in Indy
articles.summary: Marvin Harrison Jr. reflected on the Cardinals' upcoming visit to Indianapolis, where he said he had "a lot of good memories, good times" watching his Hall of Fame dad play for 13 seasons.

articles.title: Browns coach not yet ready to tab Sanders QB2
articles.summary: Browns coach Kevin Stefanski on Wednesday was noncommittal about whether rookie Shedeur Sanders -- or practice squad quarterback Bailey Zappe -- would be the team's backup quarterback in the aftermath of trading Joe Flacco to the Bengals.
